Wanted - Accounts Assistant- Female

ISO 9001:2008 certified and CRISIL rated public limited company and a leading player in water and waste water treatment industry requires:

Accounts Assistant- Female:

Educational Qualification: B.com

Gender: Female

Age : 30 -35 Years ( Preferably Married Woman )

Salary : Rs 7000/- to Rs 8000/-

Female candidates should be from In and around T. Nagar (Areas preferred T. Nagar, Kodambakkam, choolaimedu, Ashok Nager, teynampet, saidapet, nungambakkam,egmore,)
Responsibilities:

1) 2- 3 years Experience in Tally, should be from accounting background
2) Knowledge of Ms office is essential
3) Should be familiar with bank reconciliation, should be well versed in back office operations.

Wanted - Director of the Teaching and Learning Center for Co

Wanted - Director of the Teaching and Learning Center for Coimbatore based industrial group institution

A famous industrial group from Coimbatore for its College of Engineering invites applications for the founding Director of Center for Teaching and Learning.

The Center will serve 150 full-time faculty members, professional tutors, and learning and writing specialists. The Director will advance excellence in teaching and learning by creating, managing, and sustaining innovative and collaborative programs to support faculty development for excellence in teaching. The Institution is a student-centered conceptual learning environment in which diversity is valued and ability-based education is emphasized. The Center’s programs will include pedagogy workshops, faculty-led seminars, individual and/or departmental program consultations, and the establishment of a library of electronic and print resources.

The Director will collaborate with constituencies across the College to advance performance-based, student-centered learning and enhance student retention.

The Director will be responsible for all essential operations of the Center, including planning and developing programs, the support of teaching evaluations with department chairs, providing oversight of an assistant and a webpage designer, preparing the Center budget and developing success indicators.

The Director will work closely with the Academic Dean and department chairs to provide teaching support for faculty, to recognize and reward the integrative and innovative use of teaching strategies and technologies, to further development of a college learning community, and to strengthen the “culture of assessment” across the curriculum. It is expected that the Director will teach at least one course each year.

The successful candidate will have teaching experience at the college or university level, a record of accomplishment in the scholarship of learning, teaching, and assessment; knowledge of theories, models and best practices in learning, teaching and assessment; a demonstrated ability to work collaboratively and effectively across disciplines with administrators, faculty and students; and the ability to provide leadership, facilitate programs and value innovation through excellent written and oral communication skills.

The successful candidate will be knowledgeable about assistive technology as well as classroom, instructional and facilities accommodations for students with disabilities.

Qualification and Experience: Ph.D. with relevant experience

Job Location: Coimbatore

send resume to: nsugavanam@gmail.com or sugaemployment@gmail.com
Contact N.Sugavanam.
Mobile: Airtel: 99400-58497 , BSNL: 94454-37117 Vodafone: 9176871191
Contact: VN Sathish, Manager, Email: vnsathish123@gmail.com
Mobile: 98842-87303 , 94458-88703
